content:
I have the basic knowledge of computer programming. I have finished the course on the official website. Now I want to use RUST to write some constructive small programs. It's better to refer to the existing examples, such as website background, games and so on. Do you have any good suggestions? I am currently a college student.
thank you! :heart_kiss:
@xiaochen this stream is used for working on the compiler itself - if you want help learning, I'd suggest users.rust-lang.org or the community discord (https://discord.gg/rust-lang-community)
sorry, I'm aware of the problem, thank you :cry:
